Class MessageSubscribe

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.Message
      • data.MessageSubscribe
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MessageUnsubscribe

    public class MessageSubscribe
extends Message
    Message sent to subscribe to some topics.

      • MessageSubscribe

        public MessageSubscribe(byte[] origin)
                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Create a subscribe message from it's raw byte array form.
        Parameters:
        origin - The message stored in a byte array.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the message doesn't match the message types.
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - Thrown if the encoding is not supported by the system.
